intro: Justicia hochreutineri, commonly known as the velvetleaf false dragonhead, is a flowering plant native to Mexico. It is a member of the Acanthaceae family and is characterized by its striking blue or purple tubular flowers. The plant has opposite, ovate leaves that are often covered in fine hairs, giving it a velvety texture. It thrives in moist, well-drained soils and is often found in shaded or semi-shaded areas. The flowers bloom in summer and attract various pollinators such as bees and butterflies.
